actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-1041.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #514 (56-20).

official_title: A resolution relating to expenses of defending a civil action.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-1041) Directs that the expenses, including attorneys' fees, in an amount approved by the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration, incurred by Senator Proxmire in the defense of a specified civil action shall be paid from the contingent fund of the Senate on vouchers signed by the Senator and approved by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

titles.title: A resolution relating to expenses of defending a civil action.
